connection.offline: We’ve lost the connection. We are trying to reconnect automatically.
connection.reconnecting: We were unable to connect. Please try to reload in a few minutes.

error.incomplete-form: The form data is incomplete. Make sure you correct all highlighted fields.

heading.proposal-view: {{scheduledHours}}/{{requestedHours}} person-hours are suggested, {{selectedHours}} person-hours will be scheduled

helper-text-for-setting.activity-selection: The extra activity to schedule can only be a “Paid” activity of type “Presence”.
helper-text-for-setting.date-range: By default, this range is set to the next Monday-Sunday work week following the current date. If the current date is a Monday, then it is set to the current Monday-Sunday work week.
helper-text-for-setting.distribute-staff-hours-evenly: If this option is checked, the optimization will distribute the person-hours as evenly as possible among the people. Be aware that this may result in slightly worse coverage.
helper-text-for-setting.employee-selection: By default, this is the full list of employees within the selected planning unit. You can further refine the group of employees by choosing a selection or an employee filter from the corresponding dropdown. You can only select employees that have the required skills for the extra activity.
helper-text-for-setting.number-of-staff-hours: The number of person-hours must be a number that is greater than or equal to the selected minimum duration and is divisible by the interval of the selected planning unit.

helper-text.delete-schedules_one: The selected entry will be deleted from the table. Any scheduled extra activities will not be affected.
helper-text.delete-schedules_other: The selected entries will be deleted from the table. Any scheduled extra activities will not be affected.

label.coverage-disclaimer: Coverage was calculated when this proposal was created. The values don’t update automatically. If the activity spans multiple intervals, a value will be displayed for each interval.

form-error.no-participants: No employees selected. Select at least one employee to schedule extra activities.

heading.extra-activities: Schedule extra activities - Set up new extra activity

no-employees.caption: No employees
no-employees.empty-planning-unit: You can't schedule any extra activities as there are no employees for the selected planning unit.
no-employees.empty-planning-unit-and-employee-filter: You can't schedule any extra activities as there are no employees for the selected planning unit and employee filter.
no-employees.empty-planning-unit-and-selection: You can't schedule any extra activities as there are no employees for the selected planning unit and selection.
no-employees.no-planning-unit: You can't schedule any extra activities as there is no planning unit selected.

no-scheduling-results.details: Schedule extra activities to see the status and suggestions of the optimization here.
no-scheduling-results.heading: No extra activities scheduled

results-status.execution-error: An error occurred while the extra activity was added to the person's schedule. The extra activity could not be scheduled.

message.introduction: Define a specified amount of person-hours and replace existing activities with any extra activities like chat, email or back office. Learn more in <0> Help Center</0>.

failure.general: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

form-error.no-schedule-entry-selected: No suggested schedule entry selected. Select at least one.

warning.information: Not possible to allocate all person-hours that need to be scheduled.
warning.reason-text: The selected employees do not have enough replaceable paid activities of type presence in their schedule.
warning.solution-text: Start the process from the beginning if you need to schedule additional person-hours.

popup.timezone-helper: Date and time data refer to the planning unit’s timezone.

not-possible.reason: It was not possible to find slots for the selected employees. These employees do not have enough replaceable activities of type presence in the their schedule or the provided minimum duration of slots is too long.

not-solved.reason: Calculating the optimal suggestions for the requested extra activities is too complex and couldn’t be processed within its time limit. You can try to select fewer employees or a smaller date range.

suitable-activities-info.hint: Some of the employees are not selectable because they are missing the required skill(s) for the selected activity.

number-of-staff-hours.has-more-than-two-decimal-places: Enter a number with max. 2 decimal places.
number-of-staff-hours.min: Enter a number that is greater than or equal to the selected minimum duration.
number-of-staff-hours.required: Enter a number that is greater than or equal to the selected minimum duration.
number-of-staff-hours.type-error: Enter a number that is greater than or equal to the selected minimum duration.
